Anima

Discover Anima, the revolutionary bioclimatic pergola that transforms your outdoor spaces into an oasis of freedom and comfort!
Expertly designed to blend seamlessly into any environment, Anima is the key to turning gardens and terraces into intimate, sophisticated retreats.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” sheet” margin_bottom=”40px” url=”https://tadesign.it/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Anima.pdf”][vc_column_text]

100% Made in Italy

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Custom Bioclimatic Pergola with cantilevered elements.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]

Its sleek, modern lines go beyond aesthetics, embodying an innovative and visionary spirit. Thanks to its cantilevered elements and sunshade features, you can create distinctive micro-architectures that redefine your idea of relaxation and social interaction.

Imagine effortlessly adjusting light, airflow, and privacy, turning your outdoor space into your personal sanctuary immersed in nature. With Anima, every moment becomes a unique experience, where contemporary elegance, flexibility, and well-being merge into a place of pure joy.

Don’t wait—start living your outdoor dream today!

Performing coverage

Rotating louvers provide excellent protection from sun, wind, rain and snow. Adjustable from 0 to 135°, they allow autonomous management of light and air intake, ensuring perfect ventilation at all times.

Quick and easy installation

With patented FAST engagement louvers.

Insulation

Option to have insulated blades.

Rainwater channelling

Excess rainwater is channelled through a double gutter through support columns, and discharged to the ground.

Indoor and outdoor perimeter LED strip lighting system, LED ceiling spotlights to illuminate outdoor evenings.

Maximum comfort with the remote control for adjusting the light intensity.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]

Anima is the only pergola that has exactly the dimensions you need, down to the inch: you no longer have to adapt your needs to the pitch of the slats.

Ideal in the garden or terrace, as an extension of a home, or as a stand-alone system

Performing coverage

Rotating louvers provide excellent protection from sun, wind, rain and snow. Adjustable from 0 to 135°, they allow autonomous management of light and air intake, ensuring perfect ventilation at all times.

Quick and easy installation

With patented FAST engagement louvers.

Insulation

Option to have insulated blades.

Rainwater channelling

Excess rainwater is channelled through a double gutter through support columns, and discharged to the ground.

Indoor and outdoor perimeter LED strip lighting system, LED ceiling spotlights to illuminate outdoor evenings.

Maximum comfort with remote control for light intensity management (optional).[/vc_column_text][nectar_global_section id=”2759″][nectar_global_section id=”2764″][/vc_column][vc_column Motorization

The standard, retractable motor provides increased safety in the event of electrical discharge due to its low 24V DC voltage. Includes control unit and remote control.

Sensors

Wind sensor
Rain sensor

Control unit

Essential for the operating of the wind sensor, rain sensor, LEDs, and spotlights.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]

IoT connected

Thanks to the standard control unit that can be connected via WiFi, it is possible to control it remotely via the Anima APP.
Manage lights, the opening of louvers and shades with a tap.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]

Lighting

LED spotlight on the blades
4W-300 Lumen, 3000° Kelvin, IP65. 50 mm hole

LED Stripes

Internal and external perimeter lights 10W-1000 Lumen per meter, 3000° Kelvin, IP 65.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]Slat insulation
With rock wool
Thermal and acoustic performance

Con EPS
Prestazioni termiche

Custom nameplate

Design, drawing and fabrication of special plates
